website_summaries.verdict: A hood that is both attractive and affordable, but also noisy and not the most effective model on our shortlist.
pros: Simplistic, stainless steel design for an affordable price
Owners have commented that the installation process isn't too difficult
cons: Touch control panel has been known to malfunction or quit working altogether

customer_reviews.title: Works great WHEN controls will work.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for kitchen remodel. Powerful exaust. Touch controls are aggravating. You must touch it, rub it, talk to it and negotiate with it to get the fan to come on. Forget setting the time or timer however the light will readily operate! I would return it but did not install until remodel was completed. I suggest plugging it in and testing controls as soon as it arrives and before installing.
customer_reviews.author: CDA

customer_reviews.title: Control panel died after 3 years of use
customer_reviews.text: Loved the look and functionality of this product however after 3 years the control panel went and now the product is unusable. Just emailed the company for instructions on how to purchase a new control panel. Stay tuned to see if I receive a reply. Received a reply from the seller- the Seller asked me to crawl up inside the hood to photograph silver labels inside the hood and then take a photo of the whole product. I did so and then was told they no longer make the product but I could purchase some other product to replace it from someone else. What the heck is that? Dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: missm

customer_reviews.title: Great for looking at, horrible if you expect it to work more then twice
customer_reviews.text: Our unit is almost 6 months old and had a number of issues. The control panel that turns everything on and off just failed today. It doesn't keep correct time, it creeps forward a few minutes each day. When the touch pass controller did work, it made a very loud beep noise every time you touched a button. Not just loud, obnoxiously loud so everyone in the house and back yard can hear it. This is priced this low for a reason, if you never plan on using it and don't mind the incorrect time displayed on the bright led display it's a good show piece, nothing more. Two years later, doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Eric Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Bad Switch (again)
customer_reviews.text: Over all this hood is great for the price. I have had trouble with the switch and was very pleased with customer support the first time it went out, I will be asking Customer Support today for a replacement switch as the replacement sent the first time has now malfunctioned. We do a lot of steamed cooking and I think that is causing the electronics in the switch to fail. The pc board is inside a plastic box and I don't think it is well enough protected. I do like the hood, installation was simple. Yea great customer service, replacement part being shipped tomorrow. Any suggestions on how to prevent steam from getting into the components is appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: TRiver

customer_reviews.title: Narrow, unit only measures 29 9/16" wide beware of the gap
customer_reviews.text: We installed the unit today and are unhappy. It has a gap at both sides as the unit only measures 29 9/16" wide. It is not as advertised. It is not 30" wide and looks tereible between the two adjacent cabinets. Beware. Will update after we turn it on and see how noisy it is and if it works as noted. Turned it on and set the clock. Clock only shows 24 hour time, and turning light on and off gives a loud beep. It's noise isn't terrible, though it's not quiet. You cannot turn off the beep nor change the time format according to the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Rick ICON

customer_reviews.title: Looks good. Has imperfections.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to wipe down. Seems to have a sealant on it which catches dust and dirt. Can’t find a cleaning solution to truly clean it off. Also, clock is military time and never stays accurate. No directions on how to change that setting. Looks good.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: Noisy, and lights can’t be replaced.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a quite hood. My biggest problem is with the lights. They went out within a month of installing it, and I’ve been trying to find replacements, to no avail. If you want to save money, this shouldn’t be your option! Not worth it!
customer_reviews.author: E. Gargost

customer_reviews.title: AVOID! This is garbage.. Go with Air King brand
customer_reviews.text: This is garbage and I returned it the same day. It has a overwhelmingly bright blue LED clock display that only does military time. It's blinding at night and there's no way to dim it or turn it off. The thing sounds like a lawnmower and came with a huge dent. You should absolutely, without a doubt not get this, but get the Air King GRAN30SS 30-Inch Granada Chimney Style Range Hood, Stainless Steel off Amazon. The Air King unit is the minimum quality standard you should expect for a hood, and it's in my kitchen to this day.
customer_reviews.author: Eliot Scarpetti

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my parents, was very easy to install, lightweight. Wish the lights were in the front; but it is not a big deal. My parents love it and that what counts, not loud, strong enough. update after 10 months of light use; It stalled for no apparent reason last night! but it started working by itself this morning!! Update #2, It is dead!!!!!!!!!!! after 15 months of very light use!!! I don't recommend at all!!
customer_reviews.author: faldar9311

customer_reviews.title: Great product love it
customer_reviews.text: It was a pleasant choice for my customers! The price is satisfactory and the product looks beautiful. As you can see here, it's not a scratch or dent, just a protective film. I think to tear it up after install is better if I don't want the range hood had any scratch.
customer_reviews.author: PANFENG

customer_reviews.title: Received this item without the needed chimney that's pictured with ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this item without the needed chimney that's pictured with the product. When looking at the manual for contact/warranty/replacement info in the table of contents, all three of those pages were conveniently not printed in the manual (pages 18 & 20 had other things printed on them, and were not elsewhere in the manual). This has created a work slowdown on my kitchen renovation project as we try to figure out what to do. Would not work with this company again. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: OK while it works
customer_reviews.text: This hood worked fine and was easy to install. It is rather cheap and broke exactly after a year. We filled out the customer service form online but no-one has reached out to us for over a month now. Spent about 45 minutes on hold on the phone several times trying to speak to someone and gave up. They obviously don't stand behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: mashie05

customer_reviews.title: Extremely noisy, cannot get replacement filters, follow up customer support sucks!
customer_reviews.text: The product sucks! When its on at a level 3 the noise is deafening. At level 2 the noise is bearable, but then on is not sure its working correctly. Its a nightmare trying to get replacement filters, the web site does not support it. You get directed to shoprangehoods or something, but model numbers do not work! When you email ARKDY they send you a generic email with no follow ups. Try calling them no one answers! leave a message, no on returns your call. You are stuck with no where to go.
customer_reviews.author: Anuradha Kalley

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this, I love the controls, some people complained about how noisey it was.. I don't think so at all, standard if anything. Light works great you can move them around but I don't cook with just my hood light ever. Easy to clean and great for the price for sure, pictures arent great but you get the idea
customer_reviews.author: bob maguire

customer_reviews.title: It works great, at high speed. Friends love how it looks.
customer_reviews.text: Updated: I hv had this about 4 years +. It works great, at high speed, just a little loud. The touch buttons are a little problematic, the touch sensitivity is picky. But just wipe it with a cleaner and it works again. I hv no problem with the led lights at the back part of the unit. Oh, it works great for Asian cooking and the suction does its job. Other parts of kitchen not oily at all. Overall, it works, looks beautiful with an amazing price.
customer_reviews.author: Linda C

customer_reviews.title: It arrived in good condition but found that the lights did not work
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this range hood for our home we are building. It arrived in good condition but found that the lights did not work. AKDY, sent us replacement parts, free of charge, and after my husband replaced the circuit board, the entire range hood worked beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: thrav

customer_reviews.title: clock display bunk
customer_reviews.text: I installed this hood fan early jan 2017 - it is now mid 2018 and the blue clock display is broken and does no show the clock properly. blue led out in parts and it's frustrating. I don't expect things to last forever, but I would have hoped longer then a year or so and now i have to look at it everyday and can't send it back. I do not recommend this hoodfan. very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Fotochick

customer_reviews.title: Good Suction but Loud
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this almost a year, had issues with the motor right after installing it but the company (AKDY) really great at resolving any issues. Was easy to install. A bit too loud for me so I use the low/medium setting except with frying or cooking fish. The suction is very good, the food smell goes away within 20 minutes after done cooking with the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Mina

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality.
customer_reviews.text: The outlet duct was not easy to install and I could not get the carbon filters because when I read the recommendations of people who bought it they say they do not fit on the base.
customer_reviews.author: Ramon L. Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: and while this looks as good as the others
customer_reviews.text: Just installed this unit. I have installed many similar range hoods all purchased from ebay or amazon, and while this looks as good as the others, it is obsurdly loud. Really Really, wall shaking, low hum with cyclone noise loud. And ontop of that,the lights are an uglycolor and completely useless brightness. They aren't bulbs either, you have to replace the whole unit, which in my experience is very expensive. The final straw is that the touch controls make no sense. Regretting not repurchasing one of the models i liked in the past. Im thinking about returning it, but im not confident in the refund process speed.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Korenjak

customer_reviews.title: Please, please do not buy this product!!
customer_reviews.text: Don't let the good looks and cheap price fool you... When the electronic controls crap out - and they will - you will not be able to purchase a replacement module. You will be forced to purchased and install a whole new vent hood. My electronic controller stopped working 6 months after installation. Amazon needs to add a description to this product so everyone knows you WILL NOT be able to purchase replacement electronic parts.
customer_reviews.author: auser

customer_reviews.title: Modern, sturdy, excellent load range for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome exhaust fan , don't let the low price make you skip this hood range. It does not look cheap very sturdy, modern, unreliable. We installed it 5 weeks ago no problems. I purchased the extra warranty as well
customer_reviews.author: Marisol Araujo

customer_reviews.title: Powerful but issues with touch pad
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful fan that we've been using for over a year now. Unfortunately the touch pad gives us issues from time to time and doesn't respond to the touch. Have to press it several times, sometimes waiting and trying again to shut it off or turn off the lights. The lights could also be brighter, they seem a little too dim.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! We didn't install it ourselves but I think ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! We didn't install it ourselves but I think we could have. Looks clean, runs very well. Sort of odd that there are three fan speeds but it starts on speed 3 then reduces to speed 2 then 1, but really don't care as it works! Love the light.
customer_reviews.author: Amelia M

customer_reviews.title: Good price, adequate unit.
customer_reviews.text: It does what it should at a low price, but the clock is a joke.the fans are bit noisy, but knew that going in. Instructions aren't worth crap, but it's a simple install so who needs instructions :) looks like a $1000 hood, but it isn't....really. Build is good, and quality appears ok after 4 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Poopser

customer_reviews.title: leds are dim
customer_reviews.text: Loud. LEDs are dim. easy install and looks great. up-date.......the installer did not remove the tape from the flapper. NOT TO LOUD. working Great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tested in the D

customer_reviews.title: Must read buyer beware
customer_reviews.text: It looks good. It is very loud so forget listening to music or for your children when it is on. It does not suck up any steam at all. Our smoke detector goes off a lot because if that. Stay away, it has been a regretable and costly purchase. Costly because if installation. If I could post a video you would laugh at how worthless this is.
customer_reviews.author: Jared S.

customer_reviews.title: Vent Hood
customer_reviews.text: We love it BUT the lights went out after 3 months of use and Amazon does not have replacement lights nor does Home Depot or Lowes, I'm cooking in the dark and I'm not happy about that.
customer_reviews.author: Jeroladette Centilli

customer_reviews.title: Some clocks run only military time. Not adjustable. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: Fan works fine but......THE CLOCK RUNS ON MILITARY TIME ONLY! Stated in instruction manual, some hood clocks run on military time, some don't. Time system can not be changed and there's no telling which one you'll get until you plug it in. If this was in description I didn't see it. If I saw it I would not have bought it. If I knew this before I had it installed I would have returned it. Every time I look at it I am annoyed.
customer_reviews.author: Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Great at suction, very loud
customer_reviews.text: The hood works great in that is does a great job of sucking up steam & oil. The only negative is that it's quite loud. Even the lowest fan setting is loud enough you have to raise your voice if chatting while cooking. Also, the beep sound made when pressing any of the buttons is CRAZY loud and cannot be adjusted. Still, for the price I'm willing to deal with those issues.
customer_reviews.author: Eric M

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical
customer_reviews.text: In that this was not the most expensive range hood and it was a plug-n-play, I was skeptical but I liked the way it looked so I took a chance. I'm impressed with the quality and the ease of installation. The three-speed fan is great and evacuates well. A bit noisy but I expected that. The only thing I'd change would change would be to move the LED lights from the back to the front.
customer_reviews.author: Tim P. Essebaggers

customer_reviews.title: great bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: beautiful, works as well as the expensive hoods, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Melinda Barker

customer_reviews.title: Total junk. Control panel failed and the fan is now inoperable.
customer_reviews.text: Junk. The control panel stopped working after less than two years and now it completely inoperable. The bad reviews are legit. Spend the extra $$$ and get a brand of higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dos Passos

customer_reviews.title: Dont Buy It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product gets nothing from me. First of all, it was delivered today and the vent was dented. Second, it plugs in, no where in the description (as of today) does it say that. Third, when I went to plug it in to see if it worked, it didnt! Oh and ito doesn't come with a vent. Other than that, it looked nice. The design was sleek and smooth as pictured!
customer_reviews.author: Rainier

customer_reviews.title: Never worked
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this hood too early in our remodel. By the time we hung it, we were outside the return time. The electronics were garbage, and though the company twice sent us replacement parts, it never works. Looked nice despite the obnoxious light, but never worked. Spend a little extra and get a hood from Ikea.
customer_reviews.author: asseT13

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and works great!
customer_reviews.text: Everything works great and looks awesome too! We used it as ventless! Perfect for what we needed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: To much vibration on high
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. The blower motor is quite in low setting. But in high the unit vibration is excessive. Seems like it is the blower being out of balance. This is my 3rd one i bought, the other two did not have the same issue.
customer_reviews.author: Khoi Tran

customer_reviews.title: Yeah it took two units before I got when they were in perfect conditiongood value
customer_reviews.text: Yeah it took two units before I got when they were in perfect condition
customer_reviews.author: ironman

customer_reviews.title: Please open and ensure you have received what you ordered!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item in April for a house that was being built. I have since opened the box and installed the unit. It looks nice, however the box contained items that do not belong to this item and it had the wrong filters in the box. According to the links I clicked on, I missed the date to make any returns. Pretty disappointing that I have to purchase the correct filters!
customer_reviews.author: David I. Griffet. IV

customer_reviews.title: INSUFFICIENT ILLUMINATION FOR STOVE TOP
customer_reviews.text: POOR CHOICE ON MY PART. This item replaced an existing hood that went bad. This new one has LED lights in the back that shine more light on the wall then the stove. The light that you get on the stove is very inadequate for cooking. The unit displays te time in blue, it is so bright that it illuminates my whole kitchen at night.
customer_reviews.author: TCB

customer_reviews.title: BEST DEAL OUT THERE FOR A 30" SELF VENTING HOOD
customer_reviews.text: BUY THESE REGULARLY FOR HOUSES AND THEY ARE SLEEK, WORK WELL, NOT MUCH NOISE AND I DO NOT HAVE A PROBLEM WITH THE LIGHTS.
customer_reviews.author: Bridget

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: little flimsy for the price you get what you pay for. mechanically sound and operational
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Great stainless cook top hood
customer_reviews.text: We were going for a restaurant style kitchen all stainless. This fit perfect for what we needed . Very quiet fan and love the lighting. It also moves a lot of air when cooking.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Summey

customer_reviews.title: Never used
customer_reviews.text: Remodeled, finally moved in. Vent was just installed. Three year warranty , let’s try it. Touchpad does not respond,,,never used.
customer_reviews.author: lester hack

customer_reviews.title: Never order from this company
customer_reviews.text: The control panel came broken and we are still fighting to get a new one!!
customer_reviews.author: Krystin Valenti

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: My Only complaint would be it is a little noisy but works well.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Flores

customer_reviews.title: Great range. I have 2 of these
customer_reviews.text: Great range. I have 2 of these. This one came with a little dent and I just noticed it. I don't see the "return" option so we're stuck with it as is. Other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph C. Brunner

customer_reviews.title: GREAT QUALITY.  VERY SLEEK
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this. I still can't believe the price. I was afraid it might feel cheap. Very sleek and high quality. Others mentioned the beep when turning on the light and/or fan being unusually loud. Not so. Perhaps they fixed it. Love the blue LED clock.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Santor

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: Excellent and really good looking range hood for an unbeatable price. Great quality item. Big box store are $300 - $400 for similar hoods
customer_reviews.author: Kevin M. Giroux

customer_reviews.title: Nice Range Hood
customer_reviews.text: Working great. I really like the look and features. It was a little tricky to figure out how to set the clock. Overall, I am pleased.
customer_reviews.author: CBJ

customer_reviews.title: Works good and way cheaper the the other hoods.
customer_reviews.text: It works great. The LED's look really cool too. It not as heavy duty as other that i have installed (I'm a general contractor) but who cares when it is up you are not beating on it or putting any pressure on it. The fan works and the lights work so what more can you ask for.
customer_reviews.author: Paxinbel

customer_reviews.title: Good but has issues.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad quality for the price but it does has a couple of issues that takes away from the over all experience. As others have noted the LED lights are not very bright. I replaced them with brighter ones that are much better. There is a loud beep every time you touch the controls. Finally the clock on the front display is in 24hr format and very bright.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Nice, easy touch controls
customer_reviews.text: Very attractive. Reasonably quiet. Nice, easy touch controls. Wish it had a little more oomph.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Ann Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great item for the price
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice and modern. LED lights are toward back, which still suffices for our purposes. 3 speed fan is adequate, with the 3rd speed being nice and strong. Great item for the price, lower than big box chain.
customer_reviews.author: rolando

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but lights are horrible!
customer_reviews.text: Love the looks of the hood but the lights are horrible. They are located at the very back of the vent hood and very dim. I had to buy stick on rechargeable lights that are magnet mounted to put at the front of the vent hood. Also the fan is much louder than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Grateful Texan

customer_reviews.title: LED lights go out often
customer_reviews.text: My brother in law installed the product at my mom's house and the exhaust works great. The issue we had is that the LED lights go out every 3-4 months and we have to keep coming back to the seller to get new lights.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Not the Best
customer_reviews.text: Had this for two years now and the digital display is starting to go out line by line and the led lights were never bright enough. I’m giving it three stars because the fan does work well and the rangehood looks as shown in photos.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Lousma

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen hood
customer_reviews.text: Looks wonderful in the kitchen. Love the look. Reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: ZumbaQueen

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect and its stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love it, works great and easy to clean wit a cloth and coconut oil...
customer_reviews.author: Wen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This hood has great suction and it's not too loud. Love that it has the time also.
customer_reviews.author: M. Ram

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this hood installed for just over 3 weeks. Today it just died. No power, nothing. I've checked everything I can and it appears everything is connected properly. Not sure what to do now but to pay the installer again to take it down and see if we can figure out what's wrong. Terrible quality if it's already dead.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Modern, easy to install, great price. Have not used sufficiently to speak to the operation..
customer_reviews.author: Providence2000

customer_reviews.title: This thing sucks some serious air
customer_reviews.text: This thing sucks some serious air! Love the bright light.I wish the clock wasn't military time only though. It looks high end, and does what it's supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: anderberg

customer_reviews.title: This is a beautiful looking vent fan
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful looking vent fan. It works well but I havent had it very long. If something goes wrong I will update this but as of right now it's installed and in place. Works and looks great! the vent cover is adjustable as you can see. We had to cut the vent cover because we didnt have enough space between the ceiling and the stove top. For reference the picture shows a distance of 45 3/4 " from ceiling stove top.
customer_reviews.author: shoprincess

customer_reviews.title: Great Hood, bad Instructions
customer_reviews.text: Nice Hood, Keep in mind that the installation Instructions are worthless. It is pretty easy to figure out how to install it, just by looking at all the parts. Very nice sleek look, blower motor is really powerful, and not that loud...Great value for the price. It has no name on it so it goes well with any other SS appliances that you may already own.
customer_reviews.author: Laura M. Honor

customer_reviews.title: Installation is a joke.  One star rating is generous!
customer_reviews.text: This range hood looks super nice but installation is a joke. The inatruction booklet is no help whatsoever! When I called the company for additional help they could not send me any diagram or additional help whatsoever. We cannot get the chimey inatalled so we will be returning it asap.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Grwat for price
customer_reviews.text: It is a great unit stainless looks very nice, will post more when installed!
customer_reviews.author: Gio

customer_reviews.title: Looks very good. Easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Lights are ok. Looks very good. Easy to install. EXTREMELY LOUD. If it was not as loud it would have gotten 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: tttttttttttttttttttt

customer_reviews.title: Great hood.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Bright light and easy to install. Fan is a little loud on the highest setting.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer A. Chambers

customer_reviews.title: No suction
customer_reviews.text: I’m using this product with the non vented recirculating filters(which it came with , description says it doesn’t ) and I have no suction . We put a piece of paper to the vents and it won’t even hold that up which they should easily. Any help ?
customer_reviews.author: Glenn Chandler

customer_reviews.title: 24 hour clock and LOUD
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Avoid it if you can. The clock is only 24 hour (european) and it is NOT quiet. Very loud. My unit was defective in general, but I assume that is unique to my experience. I am an Amazon addict and generally don't leave feedback, but felt it was my patriotic duty to warn my fellow addicts. Shop away...
customer_reviews.author: J. Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: This looks great on the wall. And it was awsome that it had a plug becuase i just pluged it in where the Microwave used to be. I had to cut a small circle in the back to hide plug but thats it. Very strong
customer_reviews.author: STEVE

customer_reviews.title: Missing parts
customer_reviews.text: My order came missing both carbon filters, which makes it inoperable. Waiting to hear back from AKDY.
customer_reviews.author: Casey holloway

customer_reviews.title: Pass on this
customer_reviews.text: Installed in July and quit working in October. Was also pretty loud when it did work.
customer_reviews.author: kelli peters

customer_reviews.title: This one is the best value. I don't get why people say it's ...
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple quotes from different contractors. I also checked out homedepot and other store. This one is the best value. I don't get why people say it's hard to install. You need to have an outlet. Run the duct works. There are 2 holes for 2 screws into the studs and you are done. The fans is powerful. I only use fan speed 1. Speed 2 and 3 sounds like a train is going through my kitchen. Even so, it clear the room quickly. Looks sharp, i wish the led were not in the back. They useless back there.
customer_reviews.author: Tai Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Great deal and led is amazing
customer_reviews.text: Easy install and work great, you pay what what you got and it is a great deal, will recommend to friends
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: Buttons stopped working
customer_reviews.text: 2 years and Buttons stopped working. I’ve trying looking but replacement parts but no luck yet.
customer_reviews.author: smtz

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great vent, still not so sure about the cfm if accurate
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Clean and compact, easy install
customer_reviews.text: This requires an outlet to power, requires creativity to make flush. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Poker Player

customer_reviews.title: Turned out great, easy to install and Buyer loved it
customer_reviews.text: I’m a realtor and ordered for my clients kitchen redo to sell her home. Turned out great, easy to install and Buyer loved it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not working for 9' cieling.
customer_reviews.text: If you have 9' cieling do not buy it. Too short.
customer_reviews.author: mykola selyutin

customer_reviews.title: Controls not functioning
customer_reviews.text: Less than one year after purchasing and mounting this hood the touch pad has stopped functioning. It would be great if someone from the manufacturer could contact me so we can arrange for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Aram Paraghamian

customer_reviews.title: Thus vent is very nice, however I wish the lights were positioned in ...
customer_reviews.text: Thus vent is very nice , however I wish the lights were positioned in the front or middle of the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome and half the price!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price excellent quality!!! Looks like the super expensive ones for half the price!!!
customer_reviews.author: OneFitMama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.text: Really likes nice above my range. It is a little on the heavy side so make sure it's mounted correctly.

customer_reviews.title: Love the new hood vent we chose off Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Love the new hood vent we chose off Amazon!! If we ordered a hood through any big box store it would have cost 3-4x as much... but this hood is great! The only thing I would say I would change would be that the lights don't give off very much light for cooking. Similar to a night-light almost. Thankfully we have ample lights in our kitchen.

customer_reviews.title: If I could do it again I'd buy nicer
customer_reviews.text: Not bad for the price, but I'd spend a little more to have something nicer. We've had this for a year and it's noisy and impossible to keep the clock set. Oh, it's also a 24 hour (military time) clock, with no 12 hour option.

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking unit and does what it's suppose to
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking unit and does what it's suppose to. 3 things that bug me. 1)Loud beep at every command. 2)Can't get it off 24 hour clock 3)No exterior exhaust vent. Not sure if it happened in shipping or packaging but mine came damaged, It's amazing how 2 small dings show up so easily on the unit.

customer_reviews.title: Our Customers have loved the modern design
customer_reviews.text: We use this in many of our home remodels. Our Customers have loved the modern design, it works perfectly every time and you can not beat the price for the quality that is delivered. We highly recommend this item.

product_meta.title: AKDY European Style Wall Mount Stainless Steel Range Hood Vent with Touch Control and Carbon Filters (30)
product_meta.description:
This bold range hood design is bound to catch your eyes with its smooth brushed stainless steel to its robust edges. The wall mount range hood comes in a 30-inch width and has a lot to offer for the chef in your household. Turn on your touch panel and see the multiple options. Options like a sixty-minute timer, twelve-hour clock, and a three-speed fan that can reach up to 217 CFM. Two Stainless Steel Baffle filters keep unwanted oil particles from leaving odors and keeping your kitchen fresh. They can be easily cleaned through your dishwasher and can easily be put back with no hassle. For ductless recirculating installation, a carbon filter kit is included (CF0014).

Dimension: 29.5 in. W x 18.9 in. L x 36.3 in. H

Required Ceiling Height: 8 to 8.5 ft.

Airflow: 217 CFM Control

Type: Touch Panel

Noise Level: Less than 60db at maxCFM

Lighting: 2 x LED

Product Finish: Brushed Stainless Steel

Voltage: 120-Volt / 60Hz

Filter Type: 2 x Baffle Filter

Ductless / Ventless: convertible with included carbon filter

Additional Chimney: Yes (Sold Separately)

Certification: ETL Compliance with US and Canada Safety Standards

Warranty: Limited 3-Years Parts Warranty
feature_bullets: WHAT YOU NEED: On the search for the ultimate range hood for a professional-looking kitchen? We have the answer: the Firebird 30 in. stainless steel wall mount hood vents will eliminate any steam or odor!

PREMIUM POWER: The pyramid-shape wall mount hood has a powerful 134W motor that will suck any steam or smoke from cooking. The range hood has 3 speed levels through which you can choose the intensity of the air suction.
TOP MATERIALS: The kitchen range hood is made with stainless steel which guarantees for the premium quality of the product, as well as a modern and minimalist design suitable for any kitchen style.

EFFICIENT FILTER: The professional range hood has baffle filters that are dishwasher safe so you can remove any grease or smoke stains, ensuring a perfect airflow and efficient ventilation of the entire kitchen.
QUIET & PRACTICAL: Although powerful, the 0.7A motor of the kitchen exhaust fan is extremely quiet, keeping the noise level under 60db. Also, LED lamps ensures the light you need for cooking.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.7 out of 5 stars299 ratings3.7 out of 5 stars
